column4: Latest;Takeo:------  Anti-drug police raided a large scale cannabis farm on Sunday
column7: Takeo Province.------Thousands of marijuana trees were discovered by police. But strange thing is that the authorities could not trace the growers of illegal marijuana
column8: not even one.------A total of  3452 plants of various stages of development were growing in a space of ​​797 square meters. The plants were then destroyed. ------Authorities claim to be searching for marijuana growers to be punished according to law but do not know where to find them.------Photos:------http://www.arey-news.com/archives/265509------
